    How-to Instructions

    Context

    I wrote these instructions as part of a technical writing course I took in 2020 - Become Technical Writer led by Bobby Kennedy. I found out about the course from the Write the Docs’ Slack Network where Bobby posted a call for beta testers. I was quick and lucky enough to respond and became one of the beta testers for the course. Later I also bought the course itself as I felt there was still a lot to learn (not to mention that all beta testers got a discount (: ). This how-to document was part of the assignments I completed throughout the course.
